body.p: The following list summaries the qualified configurations and their purpose. A more detailed configuration is liked off each of the sections

ol.li:
Cloud in a box
All HP Helion OpenStack services installed from and running on a single node
This configuration is meant for anyone wanting a proof of concept and requires a minimum hardware footprint
Single NIC, no bonding

Configuration compatible with HP Helion OpenStack 1.1
Supports migration for 1.1
Single 3-node control plane for all CP services
Single NIC, no bonding
No IP separation
Multiple server roles for different services (Compute, Object etc) with different disk configuration options

Single Region
Single control plane for all CP services
Single bond of two NICs
Network traffic separation providing for different services on different VLANs
IP segmentation
Multiple server roles for different services (Compute, Object etc) with different disk configuration options
